patient

Class Diagnosis

  • java.lang.Object
    • patient.Diagnosis

  • public class Diagnosis
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a diagnosis. It can insert, update and read the diagnosis of a certain patient. It can mark a diagnosis for second opinion and remembers if the diagnosis has been approved or not.

    • Method Detail

      • createDiag

        public Diagnosis createDiag(Doctor doc,
                   java.lang.String diag,
                   PatientFile patientfile)
        This function allow a diagnosis to be created.
        Parameters:
        doc - The doctor who made the diagnosis.
        diag - The diagnosis made by the doctor.
        patientfile - The file of the patient who has been diagnosed.
        Returns:
        This diagnosis.

      • giveSecOp

        public void giveSecOp(boolean validity)
        This function approves or disapproves this diagnosis after second opinion.
        Parameters:
        validity - Should be true when the second opinion and the original diagnosis match.

      • markForSecOp

        public java.lang.String markForSecOp(Doctor from)
        This function marks this diagnosis for review by a second opinion.
        Returns:
        A string containing useful information for the user.

      • isMarkedForSecOp

        public boolean isMarkedForSecOp()
        This function checks if this diagnosis needs a second opinion.
        Returns:
        True if this diagnosis needs a second opinion before approval.

      • isApproved

        public boolean isApproved()
        This function checks if this diagnosis has been approved.
        Returns:
        True if this diagnosis has been approved already.

      • approve

        public void approve()
        Approves this diagnosis.

      • getDiagnosis

        public java.lang.String getDiagnosis()
        Returns:
        The current diagnosis.

      • getAttending

        public Doctor getAttending()
        Returns:
        The attending doctor on this diagnosis.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • needsSecOpFrom

        public Doctor needsSecOpFrom()
        Returns:
        The doctor assigned by the attending to give a second opinion on this diagnosis.
